channel.title: whonixs docs and appreciation
channel.description: I just wanna say that I'm very grateful to you patrick and the other editors and creators for all the hard work you've put into your docs,in fact my personal notes on security is mostly made from your documents (https://pastebin.com/ViSN72VS ) and I'm amazed whonix has lasted this long too! I hope it stays alive much longer.Thank you sooo much patrick for helping to create what whonix is today! truly you are a very hard working individual,I remember when you had less help or no help in the old forum and you would answer all my questions so fast (https://sourceforge.net/p/whonix/discussion/general/thread/6154ddb0/ ) im just quite amazed as always how hard of a worker you are and even to this day you or your staff always for the most part answers someones questions i just wanna say thank you.

item.title: whonixs docs and appreciation
item.dc:creator: Joshua
item.description:
I just wanna say that I’m very grateful to you patrick and the other editors and creators for all the hard work you’ve put into your docs,in fact my personal notes on security is mostly made from your documents
(https://pastebin.com/ViSN72VS ) and I’m amazed whonix has lasted this long too! I hope it stays alive much longer.Thank you sooo much patrick for helping to create what whonix is today! truly you are a very hard working individual,I remember when you had less help or no help in the old forum and you would answer all my questions so fast (https://sourceforge.net/p/whonix/discussion/general/thread/6154ddb0/ ) im just quite amazed as always how hard of a worker you are and even to this day you or your staff always for the most part answers someones questions i just wanna say thank you.
